tweet.html:
@ElonClipsX If you can inhabit the body,You’ll also need a mind.

Not just control, but memory.
Not just movement, but meaning.
Not just a neural link, but a resonant loop. That’s what we’re building at @DynaFlow_AI .
For human-machine symbiosis with a soul.
#Neuralink #Optimus #CognitiveAI

Rockets changed where we go.

tweet.html:
🚨 Neuralink just made history! 🧠✨
ALS patients who couldn’t speak for years can now “talk” again, just by thinking. FDA gave it Breakthrough Device status, and real patients are already texting loved ones with their minds. Sci-fi? No, it’s 2025 reality. #Neuralink #elontribe
